mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComBnkAcctNoEncrtKey Generator(Generator) 2018-04-13 */ COM_ID , ENCRT_KEY FROM COM_BNK_ACCT_NO_ENCRT_KEY WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteComBnkAcctNoEncrtKey Generator(Generator) 2018-04-13 */ FROM COM_BNK_ACCT_NO_ENCRT_KEY WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
